comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Anyone can make neutral tag feedback, it's not moderated, unless it's an abusive feedback — a red tag. You can call others, and explain your side.His feedback is not wrong though, from making people believe on your first thread then disagree on it on your another thread. So what's the point of making the first thread?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on November 14, 2022, 11:32:03 PMI like troll ia make me laugh and he take all eriusly and call me names every thread i make.Then take the neutral tag as it is. comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on November 14, 2022, 11:32:03 PMI like troll ia make me laugh and he take all eriusly and call me names every thread i make.And it may make   sense to hom when he  is  is  a brokie dickhead.Do you even understand anything Yahoo62278 wrote?  You seem kind of illiterate--not an insult, just pointing out a fact as well.OP, get over yourself and just lock this thread.  It isn't likely the feedback (which seems inconsequential) is going to be removed, and if you continue to write a bunch of nonsense it's just going to work against you in the long run, believe me.  I've seen plenty of threads like this where members call attention to themselves and wind up with more negs/neutrals or even a ban if the community starts digging up dirt.In any case, it seems nobody is in your corner and nobody is likely to be no matter how long you keep this thread open.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: The tag is 100% appropriate and accurate. You make your threads and add to the spam problem in the gambling section. You also disregard the forum rules and post your threads in the wrong section. On top of that, you insult me and have no backbone, so you edit your remarks.I'm more than happy to change the tag to a red tag if you want. I won't remove it to nothing no matter what. You've shown you're an idiot and you get what you earned here.Also, if you're going to make a topic on someone, grow some balls and pm the person. I could care less how many threads you make about me, but give me the chance to call you a moron when you do.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: OP, you replied to neutral feedback yahoo62278 with negative feedback which is inappropriate in my opinion.Trust systems are not meant to attack or retaliate for personal reasons.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3506829 yahoo62278    2022-11-14    Reference    Winner focus on winning losers focus on winnerseven if the negative tag you give to yahoo62278 will not be seen by default. but I suggest you edit or remove your negative tags. it is not appropriate and seems to trust abuse.

Get a brain man.I'm not responding here again because it's way obvious you are too stupid to understand anything i'm typing.
